'''MINECON 2015 Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Cite|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20171115175446/https://mojang.com/2015/06/littlebigplanet-meets-minecraft-minecon-capes/|title=LittleBigPlanet meets Minecraft! Minecon capes!|website=Mojang.com|author=Owen|date=June 30, 2015}}</ref> is a celebratory [[skin pack]] for [[MINECON 2015]] that includes 8 skins of [[Steve]] and [[Alex]] wearing [[Cape#MINECON_capes|MINECON capes]]. It was available for free on [[Legacy Console Edition]]s until July 15, 2015. Due to the [[Better Together Update]], it was added {{in|be}} on September 12, 2017, although it is only available to players who owned it already when they migrated from Legacy Console Edition.<ref>{{Mcnet|new-marketplace-space-sports-and-dinosaurs|New on Marketplace: Space, Sports and Dinosaurs|September 21, 2017|Tom Stone}}</ref> All skins in this pack were later part of the [[MINECON 2016 Skin Pack]].
